cis2430_dayplanner

Class HomeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis2430_dayplanner.Activity
      • cis2430_dayplanner.HomeActivity

  • public class HomeActivity
extends Activity
    This class holds an activity occurring at home, with a title, start time, end time and comment.

        Parameters:
        title - String containing the title of the activity
        startTime - Time class holding the starting date and time of the activity.
        endTime - Time class holding the ending date and time of the activity.
        comment - String holding a comment about the activity.
